tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE actor_movie_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  actor_id INT,
  movie_id INT,
  role VARCHAR(100),
  FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES famous_actors(actor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movies(movie_id)
);

CREATE TABLE movies (
    movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    release_year INT,
    director STRING,
    genre STRING
);

CREATE TABLE actor_movie_relation (
    actor_id INT,
    movie_id INT,
    role STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES actors(actor_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (movie_id) REFERENCES movies(movie_id)
);

CREATE TABLE awards (
    award_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    actor_id INT,
    award_name STRING,
    year_received INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (actor_id) REFERENCES actors(actor_id)
);
